DKA.Title: الجوهرة اللامعة والنتيجة الجامعة; Al-Ǧawharah al-lāmiʿah wal-natīǧah al-ǧāmiʿah

div.h4:
الجوهرة اللامعة والنتيجة الجامعة
Al-Ǧawharah al-lāmiʿah wal-natīǧah al-ǧāmiʿah
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Table of the Coptic months and a table of the rising and setting stars in the year 1090 H [1679/80 CE]. Brought by either Carsten Niebuhr or Peter Forsskål ca. 1762 Various astronomical tables Nashi script Black, red and green ink Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 323-326]
